name: BOLD
description:
Bold is a unique, quiet and elegant third person exploration game, as well as a Zen game for traveling, walking, watching picturesque landscapes.
The protagonist of the game, deer (bold), finds deer herds and obtains inner peace by crossing grasslands, deep forests, wilderness, rivers, and lakes.
Key Features:
An independent and moving warm story produced by a single person team has unforgettable scenery.
With a melodious soundtrack, the melody is soothing.
A short game at the heart of the landscape.
At this moment of global economic downturn, I hope players can gain peace of mind and regain the courage of life through this game.
PEACE.LOVE
